pageContext.claim: “The border crisis, every day dangerous criminal cartels smuggle vast quantities of lethal Narcotics across your southern border, including heroin, meth, cocaine, and fentanyl, and we're stopping them now.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump cites this to justify building a wall along the southern border, but most of the smuggling takes place at legal points of entry or (in the case of fentanyl) through the mail.
